ygData.subject: well balanced weapons
ygData.msgSnippet: From what I understand about BBC warriors can use it too. A thing to think about also is well-balanced weapons, I was checking them out at the shady
ygData.messageBody:
From what I understand about BBC warriors can use it too. A thing to think
about also is well-balanced weapons, I was checking them out at the shady
swashbuckler in east commons last night and some pretty nice stats, the
dwarven 2h axe well-balanced is 16dmg 43 delay and magical, that's only one
point dmg less then the bbc. Of course they do run around 200 plat or so but
hey it is worth it. I have been trying to obtain info on Ghoulsbane from a
lvl 30 paladin who was at guk yesterday trying to get it, he may have it by
now who knows will ask him.

BTW does anyone know stats on Shiny Brass Halberd?

Sha'kel paladin of 13th order still..(if only I didnt die so frequently <g>)
(Tarrew Marr)
